scripts.build: rimraf dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development && copyfiles --flat index.html dist && rimraf dist/main.js && copyfiles --flat script/other/*.js dist && copyfiles --flat assets/* dist/assets
scripts.soft-build: rimraf dist/bundle.js && rimraf dist/main.js && rimraf dist/style.css.js && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development
